title: Anyway to find out if someone called Bluefire works here?
body: Hi im having trouble with my account and ive heard BlueFire can help with that. Any way to contact him?

replies.body: I don't know of anyone named Bluefire, but if you can give me some more details of what's going on with your account, I can assist you further.
is there a way we can talk through email?

Since you're inquiring about an account suspension, you'll definitely want to reach out via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). A member of our accounts team will be able to investigate and work with you on this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Well anyways, my account was permabanned and id like to find a way if i can get it unbanned?
